data.description: Data Governance InternFoster City, CAZoox Internships – Manufacturing Operations /Internship/Co-op /HybridApply for this jobZoox is transforming mobility with fully autonomous, electric vehicles designed from the ground up for a driverless future. Our mission is to make transportation safer, more sustainable, and accessible to everyone. At Zoox, innovation, collaboration, and a bold vision for the future drive everything we do.Zoox’s internship program offers hands-on experience with cutting-edge technology, mentorship from some of the industry’s brightest minds, and the opportunity to make meaningful contributions to real projects. We seek interns who demonstrate strong academic performance, engagement beyond the classroom, intellectual curiosity, and a genuine interest in Zoox’s mission.This internship opportunity is within the Business Processes & Enterprise Data Governance team. The team focuses on building scalable, trusted, and well-governed data foundations across manufacturing, supply chain, and engineering systems to support Zoox’s autonomous vehicle production and operations.Interns on this team will work on data cataloging, data governance, and data enablement initiatives. The intern will research and assess current data cataloging and metadata capabilities at Zoox (including platforms such as Databricks and other internal tools), identify gaps and opportunities, and help articulate how these capabilities can better support the organization.In addition, the intern will contribute to foundational data education efforts, helping document and socialize core concepts such as data management, data governance, data lineage, data quality, and data ownership across technical and non-technical stakeholders.This role offers exposure to enterprise-scale data platforms and the opportunity to influence how teams discover, understand, and trust data.Program RequirementsCurrently pursuing a B.S. or M.S. in Computer Science, Data Engineering, Information Systems, Business Analytics, Industrial Engineering, or a related fieldPlan to return to school after completing the internship.Maintain good academic standing.Available to commit to a 12-week internship beginning in May or June 2026.At least one prior industry internship, co-op, or relevant project experience.Willing and able to relocate to the Bay Area, California, for the duration of the internship.Interns may not use proprietary Zoox information in university theses, publications, or share it outside of Zoox.QualificationsStrong interest in data platforms, data management, and enterprise systemsFamiliarity with basic data concepts (datasets, schemas, metadata, lineage, or analytics)Comfortable working with structured data and documentation (e.g., SQL basics, Python, notebooks, or technical writing)Strong analytical and research skills, with the ability to synthesize findings into clear recommendationsClear written and verbal communication skills; comfortable explaining technical concepts to diverse audiencesBonus QualificationsExposure to data cataloging, metadata management, or governance tools (e.g., Databricks, Collibra, Alation, DataHub)Familiarity with cloud data platforms (AWS, Databricks, Snowflake, etc.)Prior coursework or projects in data governance, data architecture, or information managementExperience creating documentation, diagrams, or educational materialCompensation:The monthly salary range for this position is $6,500 to $9,500. Compensation will vary based on geographic location and level of education. Additional benefits may include medical insurance, and a housing stipend (relocation assistance will be offered based on eligibility).About ZooxZoox is developing the first ground-up, fully autonomous vehicle fleet and the supporting ecosystem required to bring this technology to market. Sitting at the intersection of robotics, machine learning, and design, Zoox aims to provide the next generation of mobility-as-a-service in urban environments. We’re looking for top talent that shares our passion and wants to be part of a fast-moving and highly execution-oriented team.Follow us on LinkedInAccommodationsIf you need an accommodation to participate in the application or interview process please reach out to accommodations@zoox.com or your assigned recruiter.A Final Note:You do not need to match every listed expectation to apply for this position. Here at Zoox, we know that diverse perspectives foster the innovation we need to be successful, and we are committed to building a team that encompasses a variety of backgrounds, experiences, and skills.We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.Apply for this job
responsibilities: Willing and able to relocate to the Bay Area, California, for the duration of the internship.
